LANDSCAPING DESIGN MELBOURNE

Periwinkle Garden Design & Creation believes that a garden should not only be visually stunning, but also serve as your own little sanctuary, a place to relax and escape, a garden you love to be in.

CONTACT US TODAY

ABOUT US

We are a small boutique garden design and landscaping business that has predominantly operated in the Bayside region of Melbourne for the past 15 years. What started out with one woman's passion for the outdoor landscape and her desire to create gardens that reflect that passion has now developed into a full scale landscape design & construction business offering everything from maintenance to full garden renovations. Now even as a bigger business, this passion is what drives us and can be seen by the work we do.

Periwinkle Designs worked tirelessly to make sure that I was completely satisfied with how my outdoor areas looked. They were professional, but also welcoming and understanding. I cannot thank them enough.

- James ( Parkdale)

Jeni has an unbelievable gift of nurturing and transforming gardens. Whenever she spends time in our garden, she moves a few plants here, cuts a few back there, finds a pot to place in just the right spot and the results are transformative. She has a flair for landscaping, backed up by a great knowledge of plants and horticulture.

- Kinane

Periwinkle garden design came to our resume when our giant dog completely destroyed our yard. Not only did they come up with a totally new layout for the yard which was 100% better then before but they had it finished in a matter of days without any hiccups. We now now have a beautiful functional yard we can play with our 16 month old. Our dog destroying it was blessing in disguise. I cannot recommend them enough.

- Georgie Park
